response.overview: Created by the Ford Motor Company as a public service in the 1950s, "Vacation Land U.S.A." shows Yellowstone National Park as it appeared in the 1950s.  Scenic highlights include mud pots, geysers including Old Faithful, wildlife, and stunning scenery.  Since the film was underwritten by Ford, cars from that company are featured throughout -- and the unspoken premise of the film is that this is a destination you can visit via the automobile.
response.title: Vacation Land U.S.A
